## Welcome to my website! 

This website contains more or less all you need to know about me. More things to come. Feel free to explore! 

## Who am I?

I am a research assistant at the University of Copenhagen in the section of Insurance and Economics. My interests are probability theory, statistics and insurance, in particular statistics related to life insurance. I also like to teach mathematics among other things.
